text: Eocardia is an extinct genus of rodent from the Early to Middle Miocene of Argentina (Santa Cruz Formation) and Chile, South America. The long creature was related to guinea pigs and the capybara. == References == Category:Hystricognath rodents Category:Prehistoric rodent genera Category:Miocene rodents Category:Miocene first appearances Category:Miocene genus extinctions Category:Miocene mammals of South America Category:Santacrucian Category:Neogene Argentina Category:Fossils of Argentina Category:Neogene Chile Category:Fossils of Chile Category:Fossil taxa described in 1887 Category:Taxa named by Florentino Ameghino
title: Eocardia
